DOC.brief_summary: This observational study compares the influence of Ringer's Lactate solution and Ringer's Acetate solution on organ function scores following severe burn injury.
DOC.brief_title: Balanced Volume Replacement Therapy With Ringer's Acetate Solution in Burn Injury
DOC.detailed_description: In the early period following severe burn injury volume replacement with high amounts of crystalloids is necessary. In this study we compare the organ function scores of a historical patient group, treated with Ringer's Lactate solution, with an actual patient population, treated with Ringer's Acetate solution.
DOC.criteria: Age >=18 years and <80years Burned surface area >20% and <70% Burn injury < 24 hours Agreement to the study procedures Burned surface area > 70% Expected survival time < 24 hours Acute or chronic heart failure NYHA III or IV Adult respiratory distress syndrome Renal failure Hepatic failure
